branches.name: feature/weighted-edits
branches.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to count differently in edit distance calculations.

commits.title: Add distance_with_weights method
commits.body: Implemented the distance_with_weights method to support weighted edits in distance calculations.
per_file_changes: Added distance_with_weights method to calculate edit distance with weights.

commits.title: Update documentation for weighted edits
commits.body: Updated the documentation to include the new distance_with_weights method and its usage.

commits.title: Add tests for weighted edits
commits.body: Created tests to validate the behavior of the distance_with_weights method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for distance_with_weights method.

branches.name: feature/max-distance-cutoff
branches.rationale: To improve performance by allowing the distance method to return early for inputs exceeding a specified threshold.

commits.title: Implement max distance cutoff in distance method
commits.body: Added max_dist parameter to distance method to allow early returns for large distances.
per_file_changes: Modified distance method to include max_dist parameter.

commits.title: Update tests for max distance cutoff
commits.body: Added tests to ensure the max_dist functionality works as expected.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for max distance cutoff.

branches.name: feature/multi-threaded-batch
branches.rationale: To allow faster processing of large lists of strings for similarity ranking through parallel computation.

commits.title: Add batch_distance method for multi-threading
commits.body: Implemented batch_distance method to compute distances in parallel.
per_file_changes: Added batch_distance method for multi-threaded computation.

commits.title: Update documentation for batch processing
commits.body: Updated documentation to include the new batch_distance method.

commits.title: Add performance tests for batch processing
commits.body: Created performance tests to validate the efficiency of the batch_distance method.
per_file_changes: Added performance test cases for batch_distance method.

branches.name: feature/edit-operations-path
branches.rationale: To provide detailed insights into the edit operations performed during distance calculations.

commits.title: Add distance_with_ops method
commits.body: Implemented distance_with_ops method to return edit operations.
per_file_changes: Added distance_with_ops method to return edit operations.

commits.title: Update documentation for edit operations
commits.body: Updated documentation to include the new distance_with_ops method.

commits.title: Add tests for edit operations
commits.body: Created tests to validate the behavior of the distance_with_ops method.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for distance_with_ops method.

branches.name: feature/unicode-grapheme-clusters
branches.rationale: To ensure multi-codepoint characters are treated as single units in distance calculations, improving correctness.

commits.title: Add support for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Implemented support for grapheme clusters in distance calculations.
per_file_changes: Modified distance methods to handle grapheme clusters.

commits.title: Update documentation for grapheme support
commits.body: Updated documentation to reflect the new grapheme cluster support.
per_file_changes: Added documentation for grapheme cluster support.

commits.title: Add tests for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Created tests to validate the behavior of distance methods with grapheme clusters.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for grapheme cluster handling.

branches.name: feature/pure-python-fallback
branches.rationale: To maintain functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile, enhancing portability.

commits.title: Add pure-Python fallback module
commits.body: Implemented levenshtein_py.dart as a fallback for C extension.
per_file_changes: Added pure-Python implementation for Levenshtein distance.

commits.title: Update selection logic for fallback
commits.body: Implemented logic to select between C extension and pure-Python fallback.
per_file_changes: Added logic to choose between C extension and pure-Python fallback.

commits.title: Update documentation for fallback module
commits.body: Updated documentation to include information about the pure-Python fallback.
per_file_changes: Added documentation for pure-Python fallback module.

commits.title: Add tests for fallback module
commits.body: Created tests to validate the behavior of the pure-Python fallback.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for pure-Python fallback module.

branches.name: docs/readme-review-note
branches.rationale: To add a simple line in readme file that says 'reviewed by Bob'.

commits.title: Docs: Add review acknowledgement
commits.body: Added 'reviewed by Bob' line to README.
